about_the_game:
My Incubi Harem Guide is a spoiler document with all the choices you need to make to unlock all CGs as well as get ALL the endings. It's the easiest way for you to unlock the whole content of the game (including Steam Achievements).

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about My Incubi Harem.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Incubi Harem\My Incubi Harem - Guide.pdf
detailed_description:
My Incubi Harem Guide is a spoiler document with all the choices you need to make to unlock all CGs as well as get ALL the endings. It's the easiest way for you to unlock the whole content of the game (including Steam Achievements).

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about My Incubi Harem.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\My Incubi Harem\My Incubi Harem - Guide.pdf
name: My Incubi Harem - Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Do you want to make all the right choices to unlock all CGs available in the game as well as get ALL the endings? Get a PDF document FULL OF SPOILERS about My Incubi Harem right now and unlock all achievements!
